mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id, r.provider_user_id, r.provider_code, r.created_at AS reservation_created_at, c.campground_name, r.reservation_status FROM reservations r JOIN campground_sites cs ON r.reservation_site = cs.site_id JOIN campgrounds c ON cs.campground_id = c.campground_id WHERE r.provider_user_id = #{providerUserId} AND r.provider_code = #{providerCode} AND r.reservation_status = 1 -- 예약 완료 상태 (예시: 1을 완료로 가정) ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT r.reservation_id, r.provider_user_id, r.provider_code, r.updated_at AS reservation_updated_at, -- 취소 시에는 updated_at 사용 c.campground_name, r.reservation_status FROM reservations r JOIN campground_sites cs ON r.reservation_site = cs.site_id JOIN campgrounds c ON cs.campground_id = c.campground_id WHERE r.provider_user_id = #{providerUserId} AND r.provider_code = #{providerCode} AND r.reservation_status = 2 -- 예약 취소 상태 (예시: 2를 취소로 가정) ORDER BY r.updated_at DESC
